title: Our Camping Trip
subtle: Personal Recount (fiction), 150 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 370L
description: Even students who have never been camping will enjoy this story of a family's overnight camping trip. Told in first-person point of view and cleverly illustrated by "photographs" taken by the young boy, Our Camping Trip uses simple dialogue and repetitive text to ensure readers' success.
reviewWords: camera, camp, camping, cooking gear, fishing, lake, picture, remember, sleeping bags, tent
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
